org.apache.hadoop.mapred

接口 RecordWriter<K,V>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DBOutputFormat.DBRecordWriter, FilterOutputFormat.FilterRecordWriter, TextOutputFormat.LineRecordWriter

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public interface RecordWriter<K,V>
    RecordWriter writes the output <key, value> pairs to an output file.

    RecordWriter implementations write the job outputs to the FileSystem.

    另请参阅:
    OutputFormat

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close(Reporter reporter)
      Close this RecordWriter to future operations.
      void write(K key, V value)
      Writes a key/value pair.

    • 方法详细资料

      • write

        void write(K key,
         V value)
           throws IOException
        Writes a key/value pair.
        参数:
        key - the key to write.
        value - the value to write.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • close

        void close(Reporter reporter)
           throws IOException
        Close this RecordWriter to future operations.
        参数:
        reporter - facility to report progress.
        抛出:
        IOException
